body.text: I'm a storyteller seeking to create innovative and thoughtful films that expand my skill set and showcase my passions. In the past four years producing, directing, and editing films I've developed leadership skills and a passion for collaboration through my various roles within other projects. The process of bringing meaningful stories to life alongside a team of peers in order to then share that connection motivates my love of film and continued dedication to filmmaking.
